TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DrawingGroup extends System.Windows.Media.Drawing
Public NotInheritable Class DrawingGroup Inherits Drawing
public ref class DrawingGroup sealed : System::Windows::Media::Drawing

summary.span: 表示可以作为单个绘图进行运算的绘图集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of drawings that can be operated upon as a single drawing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用将多个绘图组合成单个复合绘图。Use a to combine multiple drawings into a single, composite drawing. 与其他对象不同, 你可以将 、、设置、 、或设置为。 Unlike other objects, you can apply a , , setting, , , or a to a . 此类的灵活性使您能够创建复杂的场景。The flexibility of this class enables you to create complex scenes. 因为 也是, 所以它可以包含其他对象。 Because is also a , it can contain other objects. 有关对象的详细信息, 请参阅[绘图对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md)。For more information about objects, see [Drawing Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md). **冻结功能:** 由于 该类继承自类, 因此该类提供若干特殊功能: 可以将对象声明为、在多个对象之间共享、变为只读以提高性能、克隆以及使线程安全。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 有关对象提供的不同功能的详细信息, 请参阅可[冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置要应用于此 的 。

The to apply to this .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关位图效果及其工作方式的详细信息, 请参阅[位图效果概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/bitmap-effects-overview.md)。For more information about bitmap effects and how they work, see [Bitmap Effects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/bitmap-effects-overview.md). 按照以下顺序应用操作: operations are applied in the following order: - - - - - ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 此示例演示如何将应用于绘图。This example shows how to apply a to a drawing. 使用来模糊或浮凸, 或将其他视觉效果应用于呈现的内容。Use a to blur or emboss, or to apply other visual effects to rendered content. 仅对象支持位图效果。Only objects support bitmap effects. 若要将位图效果应用于另一种类型的对象, 请将其添加到并设置该对象的属性。To apply a bitmap effect to another type of object, add it to a and set the property of the object. > [!NOTE] > Windows Presentation Foundation 位图效果呈现为软件。Windows Presentation Foundation bitmap effects are software rendered. 应用的任何对象也会在软件中呈现。Any object that applies a is also rendered in the software. 避免在大视觉对象或动画中使用, 因为这种情况可能会降低系统性能。Avoid using a in large visuals or animations because this scenario can cause a decrease in system performance. 下面的示例使用将应用于多个对象。The following example uses a to apply a to several objects. 下图显示了此示例的输出。The following illustration shows the output from this example. ![使用 BlurBitmapEffect 的 DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-bitmap.png "使用 BlurBitmapEffect 的 DrawingGroup")![DrawingGroup with a BlurBitmapEffect](~/add/media/graphicsmm-bitmap.png "DrawingGroup with a BlurBitmapEffect") [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupBitmapEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/BitmapEffectExample.cs#drawinggroupbitmapeffectexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupBitmapEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/BitmapEffectExample.xaml#drawinggroupbitmapeffectexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中子项的 z 顺序由的中的子项的顺序确定。The z-order of the child items in a is determined by the order of the child items in the of the . 每个子绘图位于集合中的下一个子级下。Each child drawing is under the next child in the collection. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

member this.ClipGeometry : System.Windows.Media.Geometry with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的剪裁区域。

span.span: Gets or sets the clip region of this .
The that is used to clip this .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呈现几何图形外的绘图时, 会从其剪切。Drawings outside the geometry are clipped from the when it is rendered. 几何图形不必是矩形;例如, 您可以使用剪辑到椭圆形形状。The geometry does not have to be rectangular; for example, you can use an to clip to an elliptical shape. 按照以下顺序应用操作: operations are applied in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 此示例演示如何为指定剪辑区域。This example shows how to define a clip region for a . 使用定义的剪辑。 Use a to define a clip for a . 类是唯一允许您定义自己的剪辑区域的对象类型。 The class is the only type of object that enables you to define your own clip region. 使用来描述剪辑, 并将其应用于对象的属性。 Use a to describe the clip and apply it to the property of the object. 下图显示了应用椭圆剪辑前后的情况。The illustration shows the before and after the elliptical clip is applied. ![具有定义的剪辑区域的 DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-clipgeom.png "具有定义的剪辑区域的 DrawingGroup")![DrawingGroup with a defined clip region](~/add/media/graphicsmm-clipgeom.png "DrawingGroup with a defined clip region") 下面的示例使用将应用于多个对象。The following example uses a to apply a to several objects. [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupClipGeometryExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/ClipExample.cs#drawinggroupclipgeometryexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupClipGeometryExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/ClipExample.xaml#drawinggroupclipgeometryexamplewholepage)]

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，克隆对象的 属性仍会返回

span.span: The property of the cloned object returns even if the property of the source is

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可生成只读对象的可修改副本。Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only objects. 为方便起见, 此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 当此方法复制依赖属性时, 它将复制资源引用和数据绑定, 即使它们可能不再解析也是如此。When this method copies dependency properties, it copies resource references and data bindings even though they might no longer resolve. 它不复制动画或其当前值。It does not copy animations or their current values. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

returns.span: 即使源的 属性为 ，已克隆的对象的 属性仍为 。

span.span: The property of the cloned object is even if the property of the source is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可生成只读对象的可修改副本。Use this method to produce modifiable copies of read-only objects. 为方便起见, 此方法使用强类型实现隐藏了继承的版本。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 此方法不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，但复制其当前值。This method does not copy resource references, data bindings, and animations, although it does copy their current values. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Opacity : double with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的不透明度。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity of this .

value.span: 介于 0 和 1 之间（包括 0 和 1）的值，用于描述此 的不透明度。

span.span: A value between 0 and 1, inclusive, that describes the opacity of this .
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`1`指定是完全不`0`透明的; 值指定它是完全透明的。A value of `1` specifies that the is completely opaque; a value of `0` specifies that it is completely transparent. 小于0的值将被视为 0, 大于1的值将被视为1。A value that is less than 0 is treated as 0, and a value that is larger than 1 is treated as 1. 控制的不透明度的另一种方法是指定其的。Another way to control the opacity of a is to specify the of its . 按照以下顺序应用操作: operations are applied in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 此示例演示如何修改的不透明度。This example shows how to modify the opacity of a . 类是唯一具有 属性的对象类型。 The class is the only type of object that has an property. 若要更改对象的不透明度, 请将其添加到中, 并设置该对象的属性。To change the opacity of a object, add it to a and set the property of the object. 对象的设置乘以其子绘图的不透明度 ; 例如, 如果的的值为 0.5, 并且它包含 50% 不透明的, 则画笔为25不透明百分比 (0.5 \* 0.5)。The setting of the object is multiplied by the opacity of its child drawings; for example, if a has an of 0.5 and it contains a that has a 50 percent opaque , the brush is 25 percent opaque (0.5 \* 0.5). 若要更改所选绘图部分的不透明度, 请使用。To alter the opacity of select portions of a drawing, use an . 下面的示例使用组合几个对象。The following example uses a to combine several objects. 该示例还将对象的不透明度设置为 0.25, 以便绘图为不透明的 25%。The example also sets the opacity of the object to 0.25 so that the drawings are 25 percent opaque. 此图显示了将其设置为0.25 之前和之后的。This illustration shows the before and after its is set to 0.25. ![具有不同不透明度设置的具有](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opacity.png "具有不同不透明度设置的具有")![DrawingGroups with different opacity settings](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opacity.png "DrawingGroups with different opacity settings") [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupOpacityExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/OpacityExample.cs#drawinggroupopacityexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupOpacityExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/OpacityExample.xaml#drawinggroupopacityexamplewholepage)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ OpacityMask { System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ value); };
member this.OpacityMask : System.Windows.Media.Brush with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于改变此 的选区不透明度的画笔。

span.span: Gets or sets the brush used to alter the opacity of select regions of this .

value.span: 描述此 透明度的 ； 指示不存在不透明蒙板且不透明度统一。

span.span: A that describes the opacity of this ; indicates that no opacity mask exists and the opacity is uniform.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 映射到。The is mapped to the . 映射的每个像素的不透明度值用于确定的每个相应像素产生的不透明度。The opacity value of each pixel of the mapped is used to determine the resulting opacity of each corresponding pixel of the . 仅画笔中每种颜色的不透明度值用于此处理;所有其他颜色信息都将被忽略。Only the opacity value of each color in the brush is used for this processing; all other color information is ignored. 此属性指定的不透明度与 对象的值相乘。The opacity that this property specifies is multiplied with the value of the object. 有关不透明蒙板及其工作方式的详细信息, 请参阅[不透明蒙板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md)。For more information about opacity masks and how they work, see [Opacity Masks Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md). 按照以下顺序应用操作: operations are applied in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 此示例演示如何将不透明蒙板应用于。This example shows how to apply an opacity mask to a . 类是唯一支持不透明蒙板的对象类型。 The class is the only type of object that supports opacity masks. 若要将不透明蒙板应用到对象, 请将其添加到并设置该对象的属性。To apply an opacity mask to a object, add it to a and set the property of the object. 下图显示了的三个视图: 没有不透明蒙板的绘图、单独的不透明蒙板和应用不透明蒙板之后的。 The following illustration shows three views of the : the drawing without an opacity mask, the opacity mask alone, and the after the opacity mask is applied. ![使用不透明蒙板的 DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opmask.png "使用不透明蒙板的 DrawingGroup")![A DrawingGroup with an opacity mask](~/add/media/graphicsmm-opmask.png "A DrawingGroup with an opacity mask") 下面的示例使用作为的不透明蒙板。 The following example uses a as an opacity mask for a . > [!NOTE] > 虽然此示例使用作为不透明蒙板, 但、、和对象也可以生成良好的不透明蒙板。Although this example uses a as an opacity mask, , , , and objects can also make good opacity masks. 有关不透明蒙板及其工作方式的详细信息, 请参阅[不透明蒙板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md)。For more information about opacity masks and how they work, see the [Opacity Masks Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/opacity-masks-overview.md). [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupOpacityMaskExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/OpacityMaskExample.cs#drawinggroupopacitymaskexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupOpacityMaskExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/OpacityMaskExample.xaml#drawinggroupopacitymaskexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将多个转换应用于单个, 请使用。To apply multiple transforms to a single , use a . 按照以下顺序应用操作: operations are applied in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 此示例演示如何将应用 到。This example shows how to apply a to a . 若要变换对象, 请将其添加到中, 并 设置该对象的属性。To transform a object, you add it to a and set the property of the object. 类是唯一支持转换的对象类型。 The class is the only type of object that supports transforms. 若要将多个转换应用于单个, 请使用。To apply multiple transforms to a single , use a . 下面的示例使用组合几个对象, 然后使用对它们进行转换。The following example uses a to combine several objects and then transforms them by using a . 下图显示应用之前和之后的。The illustration shows the before and after the is applied. ![旋转后的 DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-rotate.png "旋转后的 DrawingGroup")![A rotated DrawingGroup](~/add/media/graphicsmm-rotate.png "A rotated DrawingGroup") [!code-csharp[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupTransformExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/CSharp/TransformExample.cs#drawinggrouptransformexamplewholepage)] [!code-xaml[DrawingMiscSnippets_snip#DrawingGroupTransformExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingMiscSnippets_snip/XAML/TransformExample.xaml#drawinggrouptransformexamplewholepage)]

summary.span: 标识 依赖项属性。

span.span: Identifies the dependency property.
